name: Rainbow Pancake Restaurant - Match & Stack it
name_original: Rainbow Pancake Restaurant - Match & Stack it
description:
Welcome to the pancake restaurant, the smell of hot pancakes tickles the taste buds of everyone in winters, so go out to this amazing pancake restaurant & Put your cooking skills at test with this colorful rainbow pancake tower cooking game. Cook colorful rainbow pancake towers along with delicious side lines for your restaurant customers and serve your clients being a best pancake chef. Pile up stacks of pancakes and toppings to Match orders and serve your clients in time before its too late. Collect your coins and money and be a pancake boss chef.
Each client is looking for a different colored combination of pancake in a given time along with some add-ons & side lines. Get the right combo in time and be a pancake king by clearing all the 10 levels to unlock tons of toppings and add-ons. Tell your friends about delicious colorful pancake today. Prove yourself as a professional pancake bakery chef girl.
Download this new food management game for kids and be a pancake boss!!
